headline: The 225HP Naturally Aspirated Beast
selling_points: 225 HP ProStar Fury 2.0L engine - Biggest factory engine in a SxS.
One-piece chassis with fully welded cage (No bolts to rattle).
MaxLink Suspension: 29 inches of usable travel.
Steel belt transmission - No rubber belts to break.

headline: Wide Stance Turbo Performance
selling_points: 181 HP Turbocharged engine for instant acceleration.
Dynamix DV active suspension (Ultimate trim).
74-inch stance for ultimate stability.
Sub-zero 4-point harnesses standard.

headline: The Best-Selling Multi-Terrain SxS
selling_points: Completely redesigned chassis (25% stronger).
114 HP ProStar Gen 2 engine.
Lower seating position for better cornering confidence.
Walker Evans Racing Needle Shocks.

headline: King of Utility
selling_points: 82 HP ProStar engine with 2,500 lb towing capacity.
13 inches of ground clearance.
30% stronger front drive than previous models.
Massive 1,000 lb cargo box capacity.

headline: Youth Safety & Fun
selling_points: Ride Control: Set speed limits/geofencing from your phone.
Helmet Aware Technology: Vehicle won't start without helmet.
Adjustable steering and seat to grow with the child.
Protective cage and safety nets standard.

headline: 240HP DCT Precision Monster
selling_points: 240 HP Rotax Turbo - Highest HP in class.
7-Speed DCT Transmission - No CVT belt.
Tall Knuckle Suspension for superior handling.
10.25-inch Touchscreen with Navigation.

headline: The Dune Shredder
selling_points: 200 HP Turbo RR engine (Turbo RR models).
Low seating position for sports-car feel.
Smart-Shox semi-active suspension available.
72-inch width options for stability.

headline: Workhorse with Comfort
selling_points: Rotax HD10 V-Twin delivers 82 HP and 69 lb-ft torque.
Quietest cab in the utility segment.
Versa-Pro bench seats for all-day comfort.
Removable toolbox and massive storage.

headline: Direct Drive Reliability
selling_points: Dual-Clutch Transmission (DCT) - No belts to slip.
i-4WD System provides traction without steering effort.
Launch Control for drag racing starts.
FOX Live Valve suspension on select trims.

headline: Versatility Defined
selling_points: QuickFlip seating converts cargo bed to seats instantly.
DCT Transmission - No rubber belts.
Turf Mode to protect lawns.
Self-leveling rear suspension (1000-5).

headline: Honda Reliability & Performance
selling_points: Unicam engine design (compact & powerful).
EFI Fuel Injection on almost all models (easy starting).
Electric start standard on trail & race bikes.
Legendary resale value and durability.

headline: Race Winning Heritage
selling_points: Power Tuner App: Tune engine mapping from your phone (4-strokes).
Class-leading KYB SSS Suspension.
Reversed cylinder head (4-strokes) for mass centralization.
Rider-friendly ergonomics.

headline: Proven Off-Road Capability
selling_points: 10-Year Belt Warranty (Industry Exclusive).
Class-leading 108 HP 999cc Twin.
D-Mode throttle control: Crawl, Trail, Sport.
Fox iQS suspension adjustable from the cab.

headline: The Pontoon Revolution
selling_points: Handlebar steering: Drives just like a Sea-Doo.
Modular deck: Move seats/tables anywhere in seconds.
Jet Power: No prop to worry about in shallow water.
Brakes: The only pontoon with iBR braking system.

headline: Playful Fun
selling_points: Lightweight Polytec hull - easy to tow and whip.
Rotax 900 ACE engine - incredibly fuel efficient.
Trixx package enables wheelies on water.
Affordable and customizable.

headline: Sea-Doo Performance & Luxury
selling_points: iBR (Intelligent Brake & Reverse) Standard.
Closed-loop cooling system (No salt water in engine).
Massive front storage bin.
LinQ accessory system on rear deck.

headline: Yamaha WaveRunner Reliability
selling_points: RiDE System: Dual throttle control for easy docking.
TR-1 or SVHO Marine Engines (Legendary reliability).
Visibility Spout creates a safety rooster tail.
Connext Touchscreen display.

headline: Built to Conquer Rocks
selling_points: Massive torque CVT designed for crawling.
High clearance A-arms standard.
Roomiest cabin in the class.
Stock 31-inch tires on beadlock wheels.

headline: Kawasaki Strong
selling_points: 3-Year Warranty (Industry Leading).
Trans Cab (FXT): Converts 3 to 6 seats in 1 minute.
Steel cargo bed floor.
Simple, proven reliability.

headline: Off-Road Play Bikes
selling_points: Push-button electric start.
Low maintenance air-cooled engines.
Disc brakes front and rear (most models).
Low seat height options for beginners.

headline: The Bike That Builds Champions
selling_points: Ergo-Fit: Adjustable footpegs and handlebars.
Hydraulic clutch for consistent feel.
Launch Control Mode.
Slim perimeter frame.
